com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.validation

Class URLActionDataValidationResponseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xceptance.xlt.common.util.action.validation.URLActionDataValidationResponseHandler

  • public class URLActionDataValidationResponseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles a URLActionDataValidation item.
    • Reads the selectionMode & selectionContent of URLActionDataStore.
    • Selects the described elements in URLActionDataExecutableResult.
    • Validates the result of the selection with the described validationMode & validationContent in URLActionDataStore.
    • For this use validate().
    Author:
    matthias mitterreiter

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public void validate(URLActionDataValidation validation,
            URLActionDataExecutableResult result)
        Does the following:
        • fetches the elements from the result that suit the described criteria in validation.
        • validates the found elements.
        Parameters:
        validation - : the description of the validation process.
        result - : the response to validate in form of a URLActionDataExecutableResult.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the validation was wrong or failed.
